name: auto-reload-from-disk-cursor-vscode
displayName: Auto Reload From Disk (Cursor & VS Code)
description: Auto-reloads open editors when files change on disk in Cursor and VS Code (only if not dirty).

autoReloadFromDisk.enabled.description: Enable automatic reload from disk for open, non-dirty editors.

autoReloadFromDisk.glob.description: Glob pattern to watch for external changes.

autoReloadFromDisk.notifyOnDirty.description: Show a notification when a watched file changes but the editor is dirty.

autoReloadFromDisk.stealFocusOnReload.description: Allow the extension to focus the changed editor before reloading when required by host APIs.

autoReloadFromDisk.pollIntervalMs.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for fallback file change detection.

autoReloadFromDisk.debounceMs.description: Debounce window in milliseconds to prevent duplicate reload triggers.

autoReloadFromDisk.debugLogs.description: Enable debug logs in the 'Auto Reload From Disk' output channel.

commands.title: Auto Reload: Reload Active File From Disk
